long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Google and Facebook ads with confidence using attribution from Klar. This Chrome extension integrates Klar’s first-party attribution data directly into your Google Ads and Facebook Ads Manager, making data-driven decision-making easy and convenient.

Google Ads and Facebook advertising play critical roles in most businesses. With Klar Attribution for Ads Extension, you can understand the true impact of your Google and Facebook campaigns. No more toggling between Klar and your advertising platforms or guessing the performance of your ads. The extension consolidates all essential metrics within your Google Ads and Facebook campaign dashboard, allowing you to focus on what truly matters - optimising your campaigns for ultimate success.

Features:
Attribution Models: Utilise various attribution models for a well-rounded understanding of your Google and Facebook campaigns. Whether it's First Touch, Last Touch, Data-Driven, Linear, Any Click, Unique, U Shape, or Time Decay, our extension offers flexibility to analyse data in a way that best suits your needs.

Key Metrics: Monitor the metrics that are vital to your business. From Gross Revenue, ROAS, Orders, CPO, New Customers to CAC, gain a comprehensive understanding of your campaign performance across both platforms.

Streamlined Workflow: The Klar attribution data is smoothly integrated into the Google Ads Manager and Facebook Campaign Manager. This efficiency eliminates complexity, saves time, and helps you make swift, data-driven decisions.

Enhanced Understanding: Our extension offers insights that enable you to better understand your Google and Facebook ads' performance. It gives you the tools to measure ad success accurately, and adjust them for optimal outcomes.

Boost your advertising strategies and make smarter decisions with the Klar Attribution for Ads Chrome Extension. Start taking command of your Google and Facebook ad performance today and watch your business thrive.
